paragraph:
Hi everyone! I'm Mudrak Patel, a student at Centennial College for Software Engineering Technology Program.
My aim is to become a software developer and to work at MARVEL studios.
I'm passionate about learning new concepts related to my field.
My creative and curios nature helps me to adapt to changes.
My hobbies :
	->> Playing soccer
	->> Playing volleyball
	->> Athletics
	->> Sketching comic characters
	->> Listening music
	->> Watching cartoons
